DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas:
[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Date"},"ReadFormula":"ModbusR(H, 4851, Uint16) 
+ "." + ModbusR(H, 4852, Uint16) 
+ " 20" + ModbusR(H, 4853, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Time"},"ReadFormula":"var min := ModbusR(H, 4849, Uint16);

ModbusR(H, 4850, Uint16) + ":" + IF(min < 10, "0", "") + min"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Fireplace Timer"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 21767, Uint16) > 0, "ON", "OFF")"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Fireplace Time"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20545, Uint16) + " min";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Timer"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 21766, Uint16) > 0, "ON", "OFF")"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Time"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20544, Uint16) + " min";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Extra Timer"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 21772, Uint16) > 0, "ON", "OFF")"}]

[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost RH Control"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 20511, Uint16) \u003E 0, \u0022Enabled\u0022, \u0022Disabled\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost CO2 Control"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 20512, Uint16) \u003E 0, \u0022Enabled\u0022, \u0022Disabled\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Fan Speed"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20513, Uint16) \u002B \u0022%\u0022;"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Boost Air Target Temperature"},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 20514, UInt16) - 27315)/100 \u002B \u0022\u00B0C\u0022"}]

[{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Filter Change Date","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20546, Uint16) + \".\" + MODBUSR(H, 20547, Uint16) + \".20\" + MODBUSR(H, 20548, Uint16)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Filter Change Interval","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20537, Uint16) + \" days\";"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Cell State","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 4616, Uint16), 0, \"Heat Recovery\", 1, \"Cool Recovery\", 2, \"Bypass\", 3, \"Defrosting\", \"Unknown\") "},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Exhaust Air Temperature","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 4355, UInt16) - 27315)/100 + \" °C\""},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Extract Air Temperature","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 4354, UInt16) - 27315)/100 + \" °C\""},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Outdoor Air Temperature","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 4356, UInt16) - 27315)/100 + \" °C\""},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Supply Air Temperature","Section":null},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 4358, UInt16) - 27315)/100 + \" °C\""}]
DeviceProperties.ServiceActionsScripts: [{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Filter Change Date","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Day","Abbreviation":"day","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":1,"MaxValue":31},{"FriendlyName":"Month","Abbreviation":"mon","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":1,"MaxValue":12},{"FriendlyName":"Year","Abbreviation":"ye","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":2000,"MaxValue":2099}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSWNE(H, 20546, Uint16, day);\r\nMODBUSWNE(H, 20547, Uint16, mon);\r\nMODBUSWNE(H, 20548, Uint16, ye);"}]

[{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"RH Basic Level","NumericParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Basic Level [%]","Abbreviation":"bl","IsFloat":false,"MinValue":1,"MaxValue":100}],"BoolParameters":[],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(H, 20490, Uint16, bl);"},{"ActionDefinition":{"Name":"Level Mode","NumericParameters":[],"BoolParameters":[{"FriendlyName":"Mode","Abbreviation":"Abr1","OffValueName":"Automatic Level Update","OnValueName":"Manual"}],"EnumParameters":[]},"Script":"MODBUSW(H, 20543, Uint16, Abr1);"}]

DeviceProperties.ServiceAttributesFormulas: [{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Day"},"ReadFormula":"SWITCH(MODBUSR(H, 4854, Uint16), 1,\u0022Monday\u0022,2,\u0022Tuesday\u0022,3,\u0022Wednesday\u0022,4,\u0022Thursday\u0022,5,\u0022Friday\u0022,6,\u0022Saturday\u0022,7,\u0022Sunday\u0022,\u0022Unknown\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Weekly Timer"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 4615, Uint16) = 1, \u0022ON\u0022, \u0022OFF\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away Fan Speed"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20501, Uint16) \u002B \u0022%\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away Supply Air"},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 20502, UInt16) - 27315)/100 \u002B \u0022\u00B0C\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away RH Control"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 20499, Uint16) \u003E 0, \u0022Enabled\u0022, \u0022Disabled\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Away CO2 Control"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 20500, Uint16) \u003E 0, \u0022Enabled\u0022, \u0022Disabled\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Home Fan Speed"},"ReadFormula":"MODBUSR(H, 20507, Uint16) \u002B \u0022%\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Home Supply Air"},"ReadFormula":"(MODBUSR(H, 20508, UInt16) - 27315)/100 \u002B \u0022\u00B0C\u0022"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Home RH Control"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 20505, Uint16) \u003E 0, \u0022Enabled\u0022, \u0022Disabled\u0022)"},{"AttributeDefinition":{"Name":"Home CO2 Control"},"ReadFormula":"IF(MODBUSR(H, 20506, Uint16) \u003E 0, \u0022Enabled\u0022, \u0022Disabled\u0022)"}]
